sn48.5:1.4: Yato kho, bhikkhave, bhikkhu imesam pancannam indriyanam samudayanca atthangamanca assadanca adinavanca nissarananca yathabhutam viditva anupadavimutto hoti—
sn48.5:1.5: ayam vuccati, bhikkhave, bhikkhu araham khinasavo vusitava katakaraniyo ohitabharo anuppattasadattho parikkhinabhavasamyojano sammadannavimutto”ti.
